name: Tokyo Drift
description:
Tokyo Drift is a card game that simulates and is inspired by Japanese street racing. Each player takes control of a unique car type and begins at the starting line with 0 points. The goal is to accumulate points each turn using “drift” cards that are more optimized for your specific car type. When any player reaches 10 points, they win the game.

Play at:  https://playingcards.io/7hnhzk
